mapper.select: select count(1) from shoppingcar where carid=#{carId} and #{pid}
mapper.update: update shoppingcar set count=count+#{count} where carid=#{carId} and pid=#{pid}
mapper.select: select * from product a right JOIN shoppingcar b on a.pid=b.pid and a.pid in(select pid from shoppingcar where carId=#{uid})
